answerText: Karel Capek[10] Capek is most famous for R.U.R, in which he coined this word for a race of automatons including Sulla, Marius, Radius, Proteus, Damon, and Helena, borrowing the Czech word for laborer.
heading: ACF Regionals |2012 | Alabama + Yale C + Alberta | 6 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] Name this author of Insect Play, who is more famous for a play in which a group of South Pacific amphibians grow exponentially more intelligent and threaten the human race globally
